task_items.task_desc: Find risky transfer chains and return concrete evidence paths with transaction amounts.
Trace beneficial ownership paths across shell entities and summarize the shortest suspicious chain.
Locate cyclical transfer loops that involve flagged accounts and explain why the loop is risky.
Run graph analytics to rank influential accounts and justify the top-k selection.
Identify bridge nodes between suspicious communities and quantify their structural importance.
Detect centrality shift anomalies between two monthly graph snapshots and report key deltas.
Retrieve suspicious transaction subgraphs and rank their risk with graph signals and textual rationale.
Plan a multi-step investigation that combines Cypher retrieval and PageRank-based prioritization.
Correlate schema hints with query outputs and analytics scores to produce a final decision report.
Design schema evolution for a new relationship type and provide backward-compatible migration steps.
Propose constraints and indexes to prevent duplicate edge creation and unstable query plans.
Extend ontology mapping from natural language intents to graph entities and relation candidates.
